pkgmetadata.longdescription: # Encrypted Socket[![version](https://img.shields.io/pypi/v/encryptedsocket.svg)](https://pypi.org/project/encryptedsocket/)[![license](https://img.shields.io/pypi/l/encryptedsocket.svg)](https://pypi.org/project/encryptedsocket/)[![pyversions](https://img.shields.io/pypi/pyversions/encryptedsocket.svg)](https://pypi.org/project/encryptedsocket/) [![powered](https://img.shields.io/badge/Say-Thanks-ddddff.svg)](https://saythanks.io/to/foxe6)[![donate](https://img.shields.io/badge/Donate-Paypal-0070ba.svg)](https://paypal.me/foxe6)[![made](https://img.shields.io/badge/Made%20with-PyCharm-red.svg)](https://paypal.me/foxe6)Secured yet simple socket server-client for interprocess communications with RSA and AES-256.# Hierarchy```encryptedsocket|---- SS()| |---- start()| '---- stop()'---- SC() |---- request() '---- close()```# Example## pythonSee `test`.
